FAQs

Overview

CrowdStrike Falcon® for AWS Pay-As-You-Go helps organizations quickly protect their AWS environments while being billed monthly as part of your AWS invoice. CrowdStrike Falcon® for AWS has two product offerings:

  • CrowdStrike Falcon® Cloud Security Runtime delivers agent-based workload protection for your cloud instances, container clusters, and managed containers to automatically detect, investigate, and respond to threats in real-time.
  • CrowdStrike Falcon® Next-Gen SIEM ingests and correlates multi-vendor security events, simplifies investigation and search, and provides 13 month data retention.

Subscribing to Falcon for AWS enables customers to use any combination of the listed pay-as-you-go products.

Onboarding

CrowdStrike Falcon® for AWS Pay-As-You-Go helps organizations quickly protect their AWS environments while being billed monthly as part of your AWS invoice. CrowdStrike Falcon® for AWS has two product offerings:

  • CrowdStrike Falcon® Cloud Security Runtime delivers agent-based workload protection for your cloud instances, container clusters, and managed containers to automatically detect, investigate, and respond to threats in real-time.
  • CrowdStrike Falcon® Next-Gen SIEM ingests and correlates multi-vendor security events, simplifies investigation and search, and provides 13 month data retention.

Subscribing to Falcon for AWS enables customers to use any combination of the listed pay-as-you-go products.
